resources.string:
This app is for those who have a small business where they would like to have a mobile cash register and have better overview of stock and items in store. The app contains a cash register, a store items function, a list of all employees and a statistics function where you can see a static of products and turnover. Above it, there is also a profile where users can view and modify their information or change the profile picture.

The app is open source. Source code is available to anyone who would like to use parts of it or develop it (See the above link to Github). The app uses some 3rd party open source libraries.

Android Advanced semester project developed by:
 Amjad Azizi s127817 
 Fahima Azizi s081961
Android Buttons With Built-in Progress Meters.
Your initials are used as your username for this application. Choose one you find easy to remember.
"Not Enough in Stock. We have only: "
Choose whether you want to show your name when writting messages to your colleagues
The Check Is not big enough!
This password will be your access code to log in with to this application.
What Is Your Email and Phone Number?
When you enter your name, it is easier for your colleagues to recognize you.
Your Email must be the one that is added to this application by your store manager, and this will also function as the login username to this application.
